summary: Accomplished Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience specializing in Python and TypeScript/JavaScript full-stack development. Elite problem solver ranked in the top 2.5% on LeetCode, demonstrating exceptional algorithm expertise. Proven track record in building scalable applications using ORMs, microservices architecture, and cloud technologies. Passionate about contributing to technology solutions that drive sustainability and positive impact.

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley | Lead Software Engineer
details: Spearheaded development of complex distributed systems using Python and Node.js, implementing advanced algorithms for optimal system performance and scalability
